title: How valuable is a summer internship in the 3rd year for placements?
content: I already have a 2 month internship that i did after my second year. How valuable would a summer internship be after the 3rd year for placements. Although the company isn't bad, I'm not interested in a PPO with the company I would be interning with. Would my time be better spent focusing on placement prep?

comments.body: any internship is valuable enough if its according what role u are focussing towards
